meanings.definition: Of or relating to invention or inventors.
meanings.sent1: The inventorial process involves coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent2: Her inventorial skills helped her create a unique product.
meanings.sent3: The inventorial mind of the scientist never stopped thinking of new solutions.
meanings.sent4: His inventorial spirit soared as he worked on his latest project.
meanings.sent5: The inventorial nature of the workshop inspired creativity in all attendees.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of an inventor or their work.
meanings.sent1: The inventorial mindset is always seeking innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The inventorial design of the machine impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The inventorial touch of the artist transformed the ordinary into extraordinary.
meanings.sent4: Her inventorial approach to problem-solving made her stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The inventorial flair of the chef was evident in every dish served.
